R scripts that can be used to scrape the git commit history of a project.
The commits can then be categorised and used to produce a animated plot of the project over time as shown below.
This was originally created as a way of displaying activity of my PhD but could be used for any project.

![](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/lazappi/phd-commits/master/phd_commits.gif)
